name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A cancer-stricken mother died with regret after searching for her son for 9 years. At the last moment of her life, she used all her strength to write down her last wish, hoping that everyone would help her find her child. Li Xuemei was from Guangdong. In 2015, her 5-year-old child Liu Jiazhu disappeared. In May 2012, Li Xuemei was diagnosed with advanced lung cancer. At the end of July 2012, Li Xuemei went to Heyuan People's Hospital for treatment. According to her family, Li Xuemei will be buried on August 23. After finding her child in the future, they will take the child to visit her grave.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, a student from Xiamen Institute of Technology complained that the school had added a thousand surveillance devices on campus to monitor morning jogging, littering, being late and leaving early, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 20, Zhangjiakou. A group of people kowtowed and crawled on the road, begging the Xiahuayuan government to make decisions for the people.
